name: lokalise
title: Lokalise
description: Manage Lokalise translations directly from Raycast. Add new translation keys, search and browse existing translations, and copy values to clipboardâ€”all without leaving your workflow.
author: ikupenov

commands.name: add-translation
commands.title: Add Translation
commands.description: Add a new translation key to Lokalise

commands.name: view-translations
commands.title: View Translations
commands.description: View and search translation keys from Lokalise

tools.name: extract-keys-from-image
tools.title: Extract Keys from Image
tools.description: Extract translation keys from a design screenshot, Figma export, or UI mockup. Analyzes the image using AI to identify all translatable text and suggests appropriate key names. Use this when the user provides a screenshot or image of a design.

imageUrl.description: URL or path to the image file (screenshot, Figma export, UI mockup)

platform.description: Target platform for the extracted keys (defaults to 'web')

context.description: Optional context about the image (e.g., 'login screen', 'settings page', 'onboarding flow')

tools.name: search-translation-keys
tools.title: Search Translation Keys
tools.description: Search for existing translation keys in Lokalise. Returns matching keys with their translations and metadata.

query.description: Search query to find translation keys

tools.name: add-translation-key
tools.title: Add Translation Key
tools.description: Add a new translation key to Lokalise. This will create the key with the provided details. Always confirm with the user before adding keys.

description.description: Optional description to help translators understand the context

tools.name: get-translation-key-details
tools.title: Get Translation Key Details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific translation key including all translations and screenshots.

keyName.description: The translation key name to look up

tools.name: list-files
tools.title: List Files
tools.description: List all available files in the Lokalise project. Use this to get the list of files that can be assigned to translation keys.

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: Your Lokalise API token (found in your Lokalise profile settings)

preferences.name: projectId
preferences.title: Project ID
preferences.description: Your Lokalise project ID (found in project settings)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
